name: QuakeInfo
0:
”Alexa, Ask Quake Info was that an earthquake”
”Alexa, Ask Quake Info for what’s new today”
”Alexa, Ask Quake Info for the closest earthquake in the past week”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quake info
des:
Quake Info is the quickest and easiest way to find out information about earthquakes in your neighborhood and around the world. Quake Info can tell you about significant earthquakes in the past hour, day or week. With permission to access your device's location, Quake Info can find the closest earthquake to you or tell you if that shaking you felt may have been an earthquake. Stay informed about our ever-changing world with Quake Info.

Quake Info uses information form the US Geological Survey.
